Title: ...And the Bag's in the River
Plot: Walter fights with Jesse over his drug use, causing him to leave Walter alone with their captive, Krazy-8. Meanwhile, Hank has a scared straight moment with Walter Jr. after his aunt discovers he has been smoking pot. Also, Skylar is upset when Walter stays away from home.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
